summary: Comprehensive testing of GuessIt app performance improvements, timer functionality, and API integration. Backend performance tests passed with <2s response times. Timer feature successfully implemented with 4 phases and proper UI animations. Frontend loads correctly with timer labels and countdown functionality.
passed_tests: Profile bundle API performance - 0.06s response time
My Predictions detailed API performance - <2s requirement met
Football matches today API - returns matches with utcDate field
Homepage loads with match cards and timer functionality
Timer labels show 'Starts in Xh' for matches 24h-6h away
GuessIt buttons display timer correctly with green background
Timer hover animation working (shows G+GUESS IT on hover)
Multiple matches show consistent timer behavior
No console errors related to timer functionality
Session management for protected routes working
Match cards render correctly in both logged-in and logged-out states

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All APIs functioning properly with performance requirements met
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - Timer functionality working correctly, minor session management for protected routes
